known_issues: Deployment failed to complete; user requested redeploy/retry.

existing_features.title: Re-run the full deployment (frontend + backend canisters) and ensure the deployment completes successfully without errors.
After redeploy, perform the production smoke/verification checks defined in frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md for Version 24.

If redeploy fails again, capture and surface the specific deployment error output (build step and failing component) so it can be fixed deterministically, and apply the minimal code/config change required to make the deployment succeed.

projectName: Retry deployment and verify production is serving Version 24
